description.description: The description of the action configuration property.

key.description: Whether the configuration property is a key.

name.description: The name of the action configuration property.

queryable.description: Indicates that the property will be used in conjunction with PollForJobs.

required.description: Whether the configuration property is a required value.

secret.description: Whether the configuration property is secret.

type.description: The type of the configuration property. Valid values: `String`, `Number`, `Boolean`
